samples.question: Why should social media trend spread too quickly?
samples.transcript: Well, as I personally as I have personally noticed that social media trends are spreading too quickly because everyone has reaches to every platform nowadays because as I previously mentioned while answering the Q card that online format has made it accessible to everyone. So social media is easily accessible to people. So that is why this is happening too fast. >> Above all social media powerful algorithms are behind because these really boost the engaging content and once any content gets attention it spreads so quickly like a wildfire. So these are some reasons. >> Okay. Good.

samples.question: >> Why not?
samples.transcript: Absolutely. samples.question: Are social media trend always helpful?
samples.transcript: Not always. I personally I have personally noticed that some social media trends are quite useful especially some educational content or some awareness content. For example, there is some content based on technology based on education primary, secondary, tertiary education and various of other types of education and on on health also. So these are quite useful whereas some on the other hand some misleading content is also there. It could be very much harmful especially for the young people who follow these trends without knowing the disastrous or the perilous results of those. For example, nowadays on on on Instagram or on on YouTube there are various types of diet plans or gym and exercises and intake of protein and there are some other things behind. So young people are blindly following these health trends without knowing the perilous or harmful effects of those and sometime they may have to pay a lot for that. >> Okay, that is great.

samples.question: Do older and younger people follow the same trends?

samples.question: How do influencers affect trends?
samples.transcript: >> A lot. As nowadays, this is the time of social media. So we can see millions of influencers all around on various platforms be this is Insta or Facebook or WhatsApp. So they have millions of fan followings. So whatever they say people try to follow them. People try to adopt those things. For example, if influencer if any influencer XYZ influencer is promoting any product or he or she is endorsing any cosmetic product or any food item or any other product then people immediately try to chase them like they are role model or their influencer he or she is doing that or he or she is following that so why not they so they immediately try to chase and copy them. So definitely they affect people's life. >> Okay. Good.

samples.question: Do You Think It Is Better for Children to Grow Up in the City or in the Countryside?
samples.transcript: I think both have their own significance. It totally depends upon the children where they want to grow up. If I talk about the benefits of the country side it provides peace and calm environment to the children on the other hand cities provide different types of facilities like quality of education, better medical facilities and many more things. that is wonderful. Before proceeding further to this interview here I would like to inform you guys that at your ILS partner platform we are offering online classes for ILS and for spoken English so if you guys wish to enroll then you can the number is displayed below first of all you can book free demo class and later on you can enroll in our courses be reading writing speaking listening and all the modules thank you so what did you enjoy as a child I enjoyed a lot of things in my childhood because there was no worries and responsibilities on me. So I am having fun with toys and I also felt enjoyed whenever I received my favourite edible things. Now some questions will be based on numbers.

samples.question: Why do people learn foreign languages?
samples.transcript: Well there are various reasons behind this happening. Some people want to continue their further education in the foreign country. Some people wants to do the job in an international company. But now a days people want to become multilingual. that is why they are learning more foreign languages. So I think these are the reasons.
samples.transcript_original: Ah well there are various reasons behind this happening. Some people want to continue their further education in the foreign country. Some people wants to do the job in an international company. But now a days people want to become multilingual. That's why they are learning more foreign languages. So I think these are the reasons.
samples.transcript_cleaned: there are various reasons behind this happening. Some people want to continue their further education in the foreign country. Some people wants to do the job in an international company. But now a days people want to become multilingual. that is why they are learning more foreign languages. So I think these are the reasons.

samples.question: So do not you think that people learn a language for business point of view and for tour and travelling purpose?
samples.transcript: Yes I think it is also a reason for learning the foreign language. If I talk about the business they can easily communicate with the people when they have a good hand in the foreign language like Spanish, French and German. On the other hand, when they are going for the travelling, they can easily understand their culture, they can do the communication over there with the common people. So I think this is the also main reason. Ok.

samples.question: What languages ​​are popular to learn in your country?
samples.transcript: Well India is a towards country. Different kinds of languages ​​are popular like Hindi, Punjabi, English. Apart from it now a days in my country French, German and Spanish foreign languages ​​are also gaining ground to learn. Ok? So you mean to say that people are eager and excited to learn not only the vernacular language but also the foreign language ok how has technology changed the way people learn a language well with the help of technology learning a foreign language became more convenient interesting as well as interactive people can attend the online classes while being under one roof they do not have to travel to the other places to learn the foreign language for example if a person living a far away from the city. So they can learn with the help of online technology and they can also interact with the foreign tutors with the help of technology. Okay, so do not you believe now a days there are so many applications and while using those apps people can easily understand about a new language. Yes, there are many apps which also help individuals to learn a foreign language. Like BJUs app, Duolingo and the Pebbles. Hum Hum ok thank you Sarjeet this is end of the taste thank you so much.
